long_description: The savvy REI Acumen daypack carries your laptop, electronic gadgets, books, folders and lunch. With a simple design and clean style, it's ideal for students, commuters and professionals. Rear laptop compartment has a fully padded sleeve that sits up from the pack bottom so your laptop won't hit the ground; sleeve fits most 15 in. laptops. Panel-loading zip compartment has planty of room to carry books, papers, lunch and gym clothes. Fully featured organizer panel holds electronic gadgets and day-to-day items; includes pen and pencil slots; includes a key clip. Mesh side pockets provide quick-access storage for water bottles. Top carry handle is padded for hauling comfort; front handle gives an additional point for quick grab-and-go action. Shoulder straps with ergonomic contours provide comfort and a great fit; padded panel protects your back from bulky and pointy items. Strap keepers keep shoulder strap webbing tails controlled and out of the way. 1 in. webbing waistbelt improves comfort and can be removed if you don't want it. Includes a clip loop for LED blinker light; blinker light sold separately. The REI Acumen daypack has reflective trim for enhanced visibility in low light.
short_description: The savvy REI Acumen daypack carries your laptop, electronic gadgets, books, folders and lunch. With a simple design and clean style, it's ideal for students, commuters and professionals.
